description: A modern, responsive website for Mann Scanning Centre, a leading diagnostic imaging facility. This project includes a comprehensive Ultrasound Fellowship Program section, an integrated open-source DICOM viewer for patient use, and a sleek, user-friendly interface. The site is built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and is optimized for performance and accessibility.
author: Mann Scanning Centre

main_pages.index.html: Home page with logo, hero section, comprehensive Ultrasound Fellowship Program details, services preview, and contact information.
main_pages.about.html: About page listing doctors and clinic philosophy, styled to match the home page with consistent navigation.
main_pages.services.html: Detailed, card-based services page with comprehensive descriptions, preparation guidelines, and clinical applications for each service.
main_pages.contact.html: Styled contact page with complete contact information, hours, location, and walk-in policy.
main_pages.lmp-calculator.html: Standalone gestational age calculator with error handling and validation.
main_pages.dicom_viewer: Navigation bar includes a 'View DICOMs' link directing patients to OHIF Viewer for secure DICOM file viewing.

removed_files: duplicate images in root (moved to images/ folder)

css/: style.css (Comprehensive stylesheet with theme management, responsive design, accessibility features, and print styles)
js/: lmp.js (LMP calculator with comprehensive error handling, validation, and accessibility features)
images/: All optimized image assets with proper naming conventions and compression
tests/: lmp.test.js (Unit tests for LMP calculator functionality)
